summary: pleas install this for your pc

description:
I have no idea why someone thought the default OSD should be some gigantic, non-transparent thing in the centre bottom of the screen, right where it can block out subtitles.

Fortunately this excellent extension makes it possible to have the OSD as unobtrusive as it always should have been, so thank you very much.
summary: Makes changing the volume much less disruptive

description: Amazing extension! No more volume overlay that blocks my view while watching videos
